name: Dark-Theme - CraftTweaker Wiki
description:
You a Minecraft Modpack Developper and you are tired of bright background website? CraftTweaker is an amazing mod, and the documentation is awesome, but the website is all white and light-gray, this hurt my eyes all the time...

I finally decide to make a Dark-Theme for the website, question more comfortable for my and your eyes!!
additional_info:
This project is still Work in Progress, but it already look pretty nice, so, if your fond somes bugs, let me know, I will look question to fix it as soon as possible!

--
News:
- Fixed the Codes blocks colors, to the a dark blue color and not the normal white color. Enjoy!
